newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Pacific & Orient gets results extension.
newsitem.headline: Pacific & Orient gets results extension.

text.p: Insurer Pacific & Orient Bhd has been granted an extension to January 31, 1997 to submit its financial statements for the year ended September 30, 1996, the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange (KLSE) said on Thursday.
The motor insurer was the only company among listed firms whose financial year ended in September that had not released preliminary financial statements, the exchange said in a statement.
KLSE rules require publicly listed companies to furnish the exchange with financial statements not later than three months after the end of their financial year.
